title: Tortilla Omelette
ingredients: 1/4 cup shredded cheese (cheddar, mozzarella, or your favourite)
1/4 cup diced vegetables (bell peppers, onions, tomatoes, or your choice)
Optional: crispy bacon bits, ham, or any preferred protein
Cooking spray or a brush of oil
instructions: 1. Boil the pasta. 2. Fry pancetta and garlic. 3. Mix eggs and parmesan. 4. Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture.

title: Ham and Cheese Danish
instructions: 1. Grill the chicken pieces. 2. Cook the onion and tomatoes with spices. 3. Add cream and chicken. 4. Garnish with coriander.
